mapper.insert: insert into market(MARKET_NUM, MARKET_ID, MARKET_PW, MARKET_NAME, MARKET_ADDR, MARKET_ADDR2, MARKET_POST , MARKET_REGI_DATE, MARKET_PHONE, MARKET_EMAIL, MARKET_BIRTH, MARKET_ACCOUNT, MARKET_BANK, MARKET_KIND) values(#{marketNum}, #{marketId}, #{marketPw}, #{marketName}, #{marketAddr}, #{marketAddr2}, #{marketPost} , #{marketRegiDate}, #{marketPhone}, #{marketEmail}, sysdate, #{marketAccount}, #{marketBank}, #{marketKind})
mapper.select: select MARKET_NUM marketNum, MARKET_Pw marketPw, MARKET_ID marketId, MARKET_NAME marketName, MARKET_ADDR marketAddr, MARKET_ADDR2 marketAddr2 , MARKET_POST marketPost, MARKET_REGI_DATE marketRegiDate, MARKET_PHONE marketPhone, MARKET_EMAIL marketEmail , MARKET_BIRTH marketBirth, MARKET_ACCOUNT marketAccount, MARKET_BANK marketBank, MARKET_KIND marketKind from market where MARKET_NUM = #{marketNum}

select MARKET_NUM marketNum, MARKET_KIND marketKind, MARKET_REGI_DATE marketRegiDate, MARKET_ID marketId, MARKET_Pw marketPw, MARKET_NAME marketName, MARKET_POST marketPost, MARKET_ADDR marketAddr, MARKET_ADDR2 marketAddr2, MARKET_PHONE marketPhone, MARKET_EMAIL marketEmail, MARKET_ACCOUNT marketAccount, MARKET_BANK marketBank, MARKET_BIRTH marketBirth from market
where MARKET_NUM like '%' || #{marketWord} || '%' or MARKET_ID like '%' || #{marketWord} || '%' or MARKET_NAME like '%' || #{marketWord} || '%' or MARKET_REGI_DATE like '%' || #{marketWord} || '%'
order by market_num desc

select MARKET_NUM marketNum, MARKET_Pw marketPw, MARKET_ID marketId, MARKET_NAME marketName, MARKET_ADDR marketAddr, MARKET_ADDR2 marketAddr2 , MARKET_POST marketPost, MARKET_REGI_DATE marketRegiDate, MARKET_PHONE marketPhone, MARKET_EMAIL marketEmail , MARKET_BIRTH marketBirth, MARKET_ACCOUNT marketAccount, MARKET_BANK marketBank, MARKET_KIND marketKind from market where MARKET_NUM = #{marketNum}

select stat_year statYear, stat_qut statQut, stat_sales statSales, stat_profit statProfit, stat_tot_profit statTotprofit from stat
where market_Num = #{userNum}

select rownum rn, stat_year statYear, stat_qut statQut, stat_sales statSales, stat_profit statProfit, stat_tot_profit statTotprofit , market_num marketNum from stat where stat_qut =#{statQut} order by market_num desc
